377 @app.route('/digest-auth-nocookie/<qop>/<user>/<passwd>', defaults={'checkCookie':False})
378 def digest_auth(qop=None, user='user', passwd='passwd', checkCookie=True):
379     """Prompts the user for authorization using HTTP Digest auth"""
380     if qop not in ('auth', 'auth-int'):
381         qop = None
382     try:
383         remoteAddr = request.remote_addr or u''
384         authInHeaders = 'Authorization' in request.headers
385         digestCheck = authInHeaders and request.headers.get('Authorization').startswith('Digest ')
386         authCheck = authInHeaders and digestCheck and check_digest_auth(user, passwd)
387         if not all([authInHeaders, digestCheck, authCheck]):
388             # RFC2616 Section4.2: HTTP headers are ASCII.  That means
389             # request.remote_addr was originally ASCII, so I should be able to
390             # encode it back to ascii.  Also, RFC2617 says about nonces: "The
391             # contents of the nonce are implementation dependent"
392             nonce = H(b':'.join([
393                 remoteAddr.encode('ascii'),
394                 str(time.time()).encode('ascii'),
395                 os.urandom(10)
396             ]))
397             opaque = H(os.urandom(10))
398             
399             response = app.make_response(jsonify(
400                 authenticated=False, user=user, authInHeaders=authInHeaders,
401                 digestCheck=digestCheck, authCheck=authCheck,
402                 headers=dict(request.headers)))
403             response.status_code = 401
404             
405             auth = WWWAuthenticate("digest")
406             auth.set_digest('me@kennethreitz.com', nonce, opaque=opaque,
407                             qop=('auth', 'auth-int') if qop is None else (qop, ))
408             response.headers['WWW-Authenticate'] = auth.to_header()
409             if checkCookie is True:
410                 response.headers['Set-Cookie'] = 'auth=%s' % remoteAddr
411             return response
412         elif checkCookie is True and request.cookies.get('auth') != remoteAddr:
413             # check for auth challange cookie per https://github.com/Runscope/httpbin/issues/124
414             response = app.make_response('Missing the cookie set in the 401 response. '
415                 'This client seems broken. To bypass this check use the digest-auth-nocookie route.')
416             response.status_code = 403
417             return response
418     except Exception as e:
419         response = app.make_response('Error: %s' % str(e))
420         response.status_code = 500
421         return response
422     return jsonify(authenticated=True, user=user)
423
